story_20_02000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Everyone seemed really excited to battle us
back there, huh?
story_20_02000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Yeah! I’m still in the mood for a few more
battles, though!
story_20_02000/2401_1001_0300_10:
The Trainers we’ll be facing in the finals are
bound to be super strong. We’ve got to make
sure we’re prepared!
story_20_02000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Of course! I look after lots of little kids back home
in Alola, so I’m used to being the responsible one.
story_20_02000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Um... You wouldn’t happen to be
[Name:PlayerNickname ], would you?
story_20_02000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Oh, I’m Calem. I recently came to Pasio from
the Kalos region.
story_20_02000/2401_1001_0900_10:
I heard a little about you from Cynthia earlier.
I was hoping maybe we could have a battle!
story_20_02000/2401_1001_1000_10:
If Cynthia wanted us to meet you, you must be
a pretty powerful Trainer...
story_20_02000/2401_1001_1100_10:
I dunno about that. The way you battle on Pasio
is pretty different from how we do it in Kalos...
I’m still trying to get used to it.
story_20_02000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Well then, why don’t we battle and see what
you can do?!
story_20_02000/2401_1001_1300_10:
The key to team battling is battling a lot and
getting to know your teammates and your
partner Pokémon really well!
story_20_02000/2401_1001_1400_10:
We’ve still got some time before the
tournament matches start...
What do you think, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
story_20_02000/2401_0401_1600_10: Yay! All right, let’s give it our best shot!
story_20_02000/2401_0402_1800_10:
I’ll be fine! Trust me, I’ve got the power of
old royalty on my side!
story_20_02000/2401_1001_1900_10:
I may be a new arrival to Pasio, but I’m no
newbie when it comes to Pokémon training.
story_20_02000/2401_1001_2000_10:
Time to see for myself whether your skills live up
to Cynthia’s description!
